review: Bought one for the living room and one for the kid's bedroom to stream Netflix and YouTube. Both also have cable boxes. I then bought one for the guest room tv which is used less often so I didn't want to pay for an additional cable box every month. The Chrome is used for Netflix when we have company staying in that room. No complaints about any of the three. They were very easy to place on the tvs and the setup was a piece of cake with the walk through instructions to connect to our wifi. Highly recommend and I have even bought others as gifts.
